block.p: FERNANDEZ-Carmen on May 3. Beloved wife of the late Orlando. Devoted mother of Yara Aldana and Leda Milazzo and Neva Fernandez. Dear sister of Louis Perez, Fred Danielson and Rachel Moreno. Also survived by six loving grandchildren. Reposing at Leo F. Kearns Funeral Home, 6140 Woodhaven Blvd., Rego Park. Receiving visitors Friday and Saturday, 2-4 and 7-9PM. Funeral Mass Monday 10AM at Our Lady of the Angelus Church. Cremation Fresh Pond.
